p: The plates were incubated at 37C° for one hour. Then, a 100μL suspension of Vero cells containing approximately 2 x10 5 cells/mL of EMEM medium (as previously described) was added to each well, and incubated at 37C° in presence of 5% CO2.The first row of each plate contained control sera diluted 1:10 and Vero cells without virus.
